title: AB’s Meltdown, 2021 Losers, and Week 18’s Playoff Puzzle With Cousin Sal
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Cousin Sal to discuss the Buccaneers’ comeback win vs. the Jets, Packers-Vikings, Texans-49ers, Cowboys-Cardinals, the Colts’ loss to the Raiders, Chiefs-Bengals, NFL awards, the playoff picture, and more (1:38). Then they guess the lines for NFL Week 18 (32:29), followed by Parent Corner (1:09:51).

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Cousin Sal
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
